original_title: Today in Edinburgh: The Open Source Hardware Summit
original_content:
Just a quickie for anyone who is in the neighborhood, today the annual Open Source Hardware Summit conference starts in Edinburg, Scotland. If youre able to make it, its a microcosm of the open-source hardware world, and full of great talks and great hackers.
If youre not in Scotland, they have a livestream on YouTube that you should check out, as well as a Discord server for discussions during the event.  Its going on right now!
title: エディンバラで開催中のオープンソースハードウェアサミット
body: エディンバラでオープンソースハードウェアサミットが開催中。ライブ配信やDiscordも利用可。
